## Air Quality

@fig-airquality further explores the impact of temperature on ozone level.

```{r}
#| label: fig-airquality
#| fig-cap: "Temperature and ozone level."
#| warning: false

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(airquality, aes(Temp, Ozone)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess")
```

title: tutorials
text:
These are the tutorials for the “open science theory and practice” part of the course “Data handling and high-quality illustrations for publications”.

prerequisites:
You will need a github account, an installation of Rand RStudio, and you will have to have git set-up in your RStudio.


set up git for rstudio
